description: Advisory published when a message was terminated using a AckTerm acknowledgement
title: io.nats.jetstream.advisory.v1.terminated

id.description: Unique correlation ID for this event

timestamp.description: The time this event was created in RFC3339 format

stream.description: The name of the stream where the message is stored

consumer.description: The name of the consumer where the message was terminated

stream_seq.description: The sequence of the message in the stream that was terminated

consumer_seq.description: The sequence of the message in the consumer that was terminated

deliveries.description: The number of deliveries that were attempted
